com.jackstockley.addressbookrest

Class Helper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jackstockley.addressbookrest.Helper

  • public class Helper
extends java.lang.Object
    This part of the program helps with random tasks to make the program function Part of the functions are logging and allowing for any data or time searching on the database
    Version:
    2.00
    Author:
    jnstockley

      • log

        public static java.lang.String log(java.lang.Exception e,
                                   java.lang.String object,
                                   java.lang.String method)
        Takes an exception from a try catch method and print the error message to a log file in the current directory of the program
        Parameters:
        e - The error message from a try catch
        object - The object or class the error message came from
        method - The method or function the error message came from
        Returns:
        A string formatted with the error message, object, method, and date of error

      • log

        public static java.lang.String log(java.lang.String e,
                                   java.lang.String object,
                                   java.lang.String method)
        Take an exception as a string and prints the error message to a log file in the current directory of the program
        Parameters:
        e - A hard coded error message in the program
        object - The object or class the error message came from
        method - The method or function the error message came from
        Returns:
        A string formatted with the error message, object, method, and date of error

                             java.lang.String table)
        Returns the most recent address, occupation, or person based on ID in the database
        Parameters:
        conn - The MySQL connection
        table - The table that the prepared statement will get the highest ID from
        Returns:
        An integer of he id of the most recent item in a given table

        conn - The MySQL connection
        Returns:
